Lawrence Davis

  1. Alternate Birth Name: [Larry]
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: John Bush
  4. Location of Family: York, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: York, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 10
  8. Date of Birth: 1915-03-27, Coudersport, PA
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: The Osceola Record, 24 September 1925; National Orphan Train Complex; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 438-441; Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf. Plains Bound: Fragile Cargo: Revealing Orphan Train Reality (Outskirts Press, 2006), p. 31-34.
